data.headline: Corporate Vice President, Business Apps & Platform at Microsoft
data.summary: Responsible for the business applications and low code platform product portfolio at Microsoft. This includes the Dynamics 365 applications, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Virtual Agent, and more. The team spans product management, engineering, site reliability, and operations.

user_experiences.title: Corporate Vice President
user_experiences.description: Responsible for the product portfolio for business applications and low code platforms at Microsoft. This includes the Dynamics 365 applications, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Virtual Agent, and more.

user_experiences.title: Corporate Vice President
user_experiences.description: Lead the low code application platform at Microsoft across Product Management and Development. Products include PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, AI Builder, Common Data Service and the Dynamics 365 platform teams.

user_experiences.title: General Manager
user_experiences.description: Lead the development and product management teams for PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Common Data Service and the Dynamics 365 application platform.

user_experiences.title: Partner Engineering Director at Microsoft
user_experiences.description: Lead the Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Common Data Service and Dynamics XRM teams.

user_experiences.title: Principal Group Engineering Manager at Microsoft
user_experiences.description: Working on the Windows Azure team to define the next generation of cloud monitoring and management. This includes Azure Monitoring, Azure Autoscale, Azure Logic Apps and Azure Resource Manager.

user_experiences.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
user_experiences.description: Developer on message filtering services for Microsoft cloud offerings. Develop and expand large scale and distributed systems (C# and managed environment).

user_experiences.title: SDET Intern for Windows Live OneCare
user_experiences.description: Designed and developed a web service emulator (SOAP-based) in subscription management.

user_experiences.title: CEO
user_experiences.description:
Responsible for technical and business areas for MetricsHub. Member of founding team and developed the company from idea stage, to revenue and then to exit. 

MetricsHub was acquired by Microsoft on 3/4/2013. The premium MetricsHub product was offered as a no charge service following the acquisition.

user_experiences.title: Campus Ambassador
user_experiences.description: Educated the University of Notre Dame campus about Sun Microsystems Products. Including lecture series on Java, Solaris and embedded devices.

user_experiences.title: Tech Intern Sr.
user_experiences.description: Designed, tested, and implemented a new contract proposal system in the .Net environment.

user_experiences.title: Research Assistant
user_experiences.description:
Produced the open source program Cytoprophet, a Cytoscape plug-in for the prediction of molecular interactions (released at http://cytoprophet.cse.nd.edu/). 
Published a paper describing the intended use in the Oxford Journal of Bioinformatics.

user_experiences.title: Summer Intern
user_experiences.description: Designed, tested, and implemented a Voltage Contingency Analysis Procedure using MATLAB.

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: Active Cloud Monitoring
useraccomplishmentprojects.description: I developed the Active Cloud Monitoring, a service that monitors your cloud applications and automatically scales your service up or down based on rules you set.

useraccomplishmentpublications.name: Determination of Specificity Residues in Two Component Systems using Graphlets
useraccomplishmentpublications.description: This work presents a novel method for the identiﬁcation of speciﬁcity residues in two component systems based on the discovery of graphlet signatures. We use network representations of 3-D structures and sequence of proteins, experimental data and graph-based learning to detect graphlet signatures that potentially are responsible for phosphotranfer speciﬁcity between Histidine Kinase (HK) and Response Regulator (RR) domains.

useraccomplishmentpublications.name: Cytoprophet: A Cytoscape plug-in for protein and domain interaction networks inference
useraccomplishmentpublications.description: Cytoprophet is a software tool that allows prediction and visualization of protein and domain interaction networks. It is implemented as a plug-in of Cytoscape, an open source software framework for analysis and visualization of molecular networks. Cytoprophet implements three algorithms that predict new potential physical interactions using the domain composition of proteins and experimental assays.
